cards.title: Fred Rogers
cards.text: Educational kids programming - Spanish. Watch selected programming online on PBS Kids and the DCMP with Spanish AD and CC. It is also available on Amazon Prime Video, Hoopla, or DirecTV or as downloads from Apple TV, Amazon Video, Google Play Movies, and Vudu. Use the All4Access app to access the Spanish AD and CC.

cards.title: Sesame Workshop
cards.text: Children's educational programming - Spanish. Watch Sesame's content with AD, CC and ASL  on Plaza Sesamo YouTube's channel. Selected programming is also available at the DCMP.

cards.title: Semillitas
cards.text: Children's educational programming - Spanish. Watch it on Charter Spectrum channel 922, Verizon channel 1721 (HD), Commzoom channel 234, RCN channel 835, Hargray channel 301, and Ziply Fiber channel 1723 with AD on the SAP and CC. AD and CC are also available on the  All4Access app.

cards.title: WaterBear
cards.text: Environment - English. Watch WaterBear content directly on its free subscription platform and listen to the AD using the All4Access app.

cards.title: POV
cards.text: Social issues - English. POV films are broadcast by PBS stations around the country, and on all PBS-branded platforms, including pbs.org and the PBS Video app. AD available on the SAP, online and the All4Access app.

cards.title: Passport To Knowledge
cards.text: Science - English & Spanish. Searching airs on PBS stations nationwide. Watch the series on its website, YouTube, and the DCMP. Accessibility features include AD, CC in English and Spanish and American Sign Language - ASL, and are also available in the All4Access app.

cards.title: Bare Feet
cards.text: A series about experiencing the world, one dance at a time - English. Available with audio description (AD) on the Described and Captioned Media Program (DCMP).

cards.title: Canal 22 Internacional
cards.text: Latin American Culture - Spanish. Watch it on DIRECTV (CH 446), AT&T (CH 3022), Spectrum (CH 841), Grande (CH 205), Wave (CH 518), or Verizon (CH 1646) with AD on the SAP and close captions (CC). Also available on the DCMP with AD and CC.

cards.title: Canal Trece
cards.text: Educational programming - Spanish. Watch selected programming on the DCMP with AD and on YouTube using the All4Access app to listen to the AD.

cards.title: New Day Films
cards.text: Social issues, independent filmmakers - English. Films are available on New Day's streaming platform and Kanopy, an on-demand streaming video platform for public libraries and universities. Use the All4Access app to listen to the AD.

cards.title: SUPERFEST
cards.text: Superfest Disability Film Festival - English. AD for selected Superfest films is available on All4Access.

cards.title: Independent Producers
cards.text: Films by Taylor Aguilar, Teregua, Tatiana Millan and Set Hernández. Watch the films with AD on the DCMP. AD also available through the All4Access app.

cards.title: Pragda
cards.text: Latin American cinema - Spanish. Its content is available on educational streaming platforms such as Kanopy and Alexander Street Press. Listen to the AD for selected films on the All4Access app.

cards.title: HITN
cards.text: Nature series - Spanish. Watch it on DIRECTV, DIRECTV NOW, DISH, AT&T U-verse TV, Verizon FiOS TV, Comcast, Charter Spectrum, Mediacom, CenturyLink Prism and Altice with AD on the SAP and CC. AD and CC are also available on the All4Access app.

cards.title: WIPR
cards.text: Educational content - Spanish. Watch it on the Puerto Rico public TV with AD on the SAP and CC, and the PRTV App with open AD and CC. Selected programming is available on the DCMP. Accessibility is also available through the All4Access app.

cards.title: KET
cards.text: Educational programming - English. Watch KET programs at KET.org and the KET App with AD.

cards.title: Crawford Entertainment
cards.text: The Outsiders Club series - kids, outdoors - English & Spanish. Watch it on the Discover Florida Channel website and app, Roku, Apple TV, or Amazon Fire TV and use the All4Access app to access the English AD and CC. Also watch it on the DCMP in English and Spanish with AD and CC.

cards.title: D'Ocon Films
cards.text: Educational kids programming - Spanish. Watch on the DCMP with AD.

cards.title: I Am Peace Festival
cards.text: Social issues - English. Selected films shown during the festival are available at the DCMP with AD & CC.
